securityProperties.propertyDescription:
These credentials are generated on the Twitter site.
 All you need to do is setup your account on twitter, and visit https://apps.twitter.com/ and create your app. 
 Once you create your app, Click on this app and get the Consumer Key and Consumer Secret in the details tab.

These credentials are generated on the Twitter site.
 All you need to do is setup your account on twitter, and visit https://apps.twitter.com/ and create your app. 
 Once you create your app, Click on this app and get the Consumer Key and Consumer Secret in the details tab.

Visit https://apps.twitter.com/ and authorize your app to access your twitter account. 
 After Authorizing, you can get the Access Token and Access Secret on the 'Keys and Access Tokens' tab.

Visit https://apps.twitter.com/ and authorize your app to access your twitter account. 
 After Authorizing, you can get the Access Token and Access Secret on the 'Keys and Access Tokens' tab.
